name: balloon-pack-pota
prompt: Detailed artifact: balloon-pack-pota, pearl, coral, cloud-crystal, pressure-forged metals, inlaid runes with gentle glow (no bloom), include hand or ruler for size context, product-style hero render, clean backdrop, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Artifact balloon-pack-pota displayed with materials, runes, and scale.
